job_description: Embedded Linux Developer (Open Virtualization Product)Wind River’s Linux team has a great opportunity for an aspiring Linux developer to participate in the development of our Open Virtualization Product.  Candidates who have an interest in virtualization and embedded real-time Linux OS are encouraged to apply.The position entails being part of a team integrating and optimizing open source packages to produce system virtualization capabilities including KVM, VM management, Virtual Node Management, and Cloud Networking & Orchestration.
job_requirements: Required:• embedded development knowledge• Knowledge of embedded Linux• C Programming experience• knowledge of Operating Systems concepts ideally pertaining to virtualization• Some experience merging patches and integrating logical change sets• Experience using code management systems particularly git• Working on a bachelor's degree in CS/EE or related areaDesired:• Experience with yocto/bitbakeOpen To All Majors:No
